Parameters: MediaCodec: the MediaCodec instance This value must never be null.

long: the presentation time (media time) of the frame rendered. This is usually the same as specified in @B_android#media#MediaCodec#queueInputBuffer_E@; however, some codecs may alter the media time by applying some time-based transformation, such as frame rate conversion. In that case, presentation time corresponds to the actual output frame rendered.
long: The system time when the frame was rendered.
onFrameRendered(android.media.MediaCodec.Description: Called when an output frame has rendered on the output surface.
onFrameRendered(android.media.MediaCodec.FullName: public abstract void onFrameRendered (MediaCodec codec, long presentationTimeUs, long nanoTime)

ClassDesc: Listener to be called when an output frame has rendered on the output surface
